hadiths.text: This hadith has been thus reported by another chain of transmitters:Umm Habiba b. Jahsh came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and she had been a mustahada for seven years, and the rest of the hadith was narrated like that of 'Amr b. al-Harith up to the words:" There came the redness of the blood over water." and nothing was narrated beyond it

chapter.eng-name: The ghusl and the prayer of a woman who is suffering prolonged vaginal bleeding (istihadah)
